name: Falling Memo(Demo)
description:
I'm trying to make this game. We are a man named Hank and we lost our memory. Somethings on our mind trying to help us to remember. I hope you guys help me for this with your donates.  

Warning: The game is like 5-6 minutes gameplaying because I started it a week ago. 

Plus : I need pixel artist I cant do it alone :(
